info.title: Community Training REST APIs v1
info.description:
Documentation for REST APIs (Version:1) of Community Training.

Note: Bearer Token is required..... Authenticate the token by clicking on the "Authorize" button or on the Lock icon.

get.summary: Get list of organization administrators

delete.summary: Delete super administrators.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of Super Administrator contacts to be removed.

403.description: If trying to remove self from the list.

get.summary: Get paginated list of all users.
get.description:
Changes

  1. This api now accepts 2 additional query parameters 'orgId' and 'orgName'. 
  
      1.1. Pass these parameter to search users in the organization identified by 'orgId' or by 'orgName'.
      
      1.2. In case both 'orgId' and 'orgName' are passed.Preference will be given to 'orgId'.
      
      1.3. In case both 'orgId' and 'orgName' are missing. User will be listed from all organizations.
      
  2. Only super admins listed users from all the organizations.
  3. Organization admin can listed users from the organizations where they have admin rights.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of user entries to skip

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of user entries to retrieve after the skipped entries

403.description: The Administrator doesn't have access to fetch users

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Contacts to be added as Super Administrators.

delete.summary: Delete super administrators.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of Super Administrator contacts to be removed.

403.description: If trying to remove self from the list.

post.summary:
Create a new category
Category data is not localized

201.description: Returns the category Id after successfully creating a new category

403.description: The caller doesn't have necessary permission for this organization

put.description:
Category data not localized.
Changes
1. Move all the courses in the selected category to the new organization.
2. If category is being moved from a non common organization to common organization and 'IsGlobalContentEnabled' is enabled.
   No relationship is broken.Update the category organization
3. Else

   3.1. Remove courses assigned to the users in current organization.
   
   3.2. Remove category and its courses from learning paths in current organization.
   
   3.3. Remove category and courses assigned to groups in current organization.
   
   3.4. Update category organization.
   
4. Only super admin or organization admin of organization to which category is being moved to can call this api.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: Identifier for the category to be updated

400.description: Category's Organization can't be updated from Global organization

403.description: The caller doesn't have necessary permission for this category/organization

get.summary: Get SAS token with file upload permission

post.description:
Bulk upload of course should be done in following manner:

1. Course content files should be organized in a predefined structure.
2. Get a SAS token for the container in which the course content files are to be uploaded.
3. Upload the course content files to the container using the SAS token.
4. Call this API with the category identifier.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: Identifier for the category in which the courses are to be added

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Import content object for holding import related data.

202.description: Course content files successfully validated and accepted for addition

400.description: Invalid Content type/file structure

post.description:
Accepts Multi part form data
- Json array of user contacts. Sample format: ["user_contact", "user_contact", "user_contact"]
- Csv file of users. CSV file should be attached to request with filename as "CsvDoc". Sample format can be downloaded from 'Bulk upload Users' pop up.
Json - List of user view models. Sample format: { "users": [ { "countryCode": "91", "contact": "4321000007", "firstName": "FN-07", "lastName": "LN-07", "customProfilefields": { "Textfield": "1", "Multiselect": "MS01" } }, { "countryCode": "91", "contact": "4321000008", "firstName": "FN-08", "lastName": "LN-08", "customProfilefields": { "Dropdown": "DD01", "Multiselect": "MS01;MS02" } }, { "countryCode": "91", "contact": "4321000009", "firstName": "FN-08", "lastName": "LN-08", "customProfilefields": { "Textfield": "1", "Dropdown": "DD01", "Multiselect": ["MS01","MS02","MS03"] } } ] } Changes 1. This api now accepts 2 additional query parameters 1.1. errorLimit 1.1.1. Pass the parameter to stop further processing if number of exception encountered by the system is equal to errorLimit. errorLimit default to 10 1.2. 'isAsync' 1.2.1. Default value is isAsync is set to true. Which indicates actual user addition and updation will be done asynchronously. Users data validation is done synchronously, actual users creation and updation is done asynchronously. Explicitly pass isAsync=false to call user addition and updation synchronously. 2. For existing user passed, if user's organization id is not same as group's organization id. User addition is blocked. 3. Error response has been updated to new format. 4. Only super admins, organization admins of the organization the selected group belongs to, and group admin of the selected group can call this api.

parameters.name: isAsync
parameters.description: Flag to indicate whether the operation should be done asynchronously or not

parameters.name: errorLimit
parameters.description: After encountering 'errorLimit' number of errors.Stop processing.

403.description: User don't have permission to perform operation

get.summary: Get all the learning paths and their courses assignable to the current group.
get.description:
Changes
1. Query parameter 'groupId' is now mandatory.
2. Returned courses will belong to learning paths which are in same organizations as the group identified by 'groupId'.
3. In case the deployment type is 'IsMultiOrgDeployment' and 'IsGlobalContentEnabled' content is enabled, 
   response will also contain courses from common organization learning paths.
4. Only super admins, organization admins of the organization the selected group belong to,
   and group admin of the selected group can call this api.

400.description: If the user Id is not proper.

403.description: If the user doesn't have access to view learning paths.

get.summary: Get hierarchical list of categories and courses for the Group Admin
get.description:
Category data is not localized.

Changes
 1. Returned courses will belong to categories which are in same organizations as the group identified by 'groupId'.
 2. In case the deployment type is 'IsMultiOrgDeployment' and 'IsGlobalContentEnabled' content is enabled, 
    response will also contain courses from common organization categories as well.
 3. Only super admins, organization admins of the organization the selected group belong to,
    and group admin of the selected group can call this api.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Optional group identifier for getting categories and courses assigned to a group

parameters.name: restrictCourse
parameters.description: When the flag is enabled, response is required for the "Restrict Course" tab, else for "Assign Course" tab

post.description:
Accepts

   - Json array of user contacts.
     
     Sample format: 
```
     {"Contacts":["abc1@somemail.com", "abc2@somemail.com", "abc3@somemail.com"]}
```
Changes

  1. Create/Update user flows are now blocked. User can not be created/updated by this api call.
  2. This api will only assign lp to users in case
  
     a. User already exists.
     
     b. Learning path org id and same as user org id.
     
  3. Only exception to 2.b is 'IsGlobalContentEnabled'. In case the deployment type is 'IsMultiOrgDeployment' and
     'IsGlobalContentEnabled' content is enabled. learning paths belonging to 'common' organization can be assigned to a
     user in any organization.
  4. This api now accepts 2 additional query parameter
  
     a. 'isAsync': Default value is isAsync is set to true. Which indicates actual learning path assignment will be done asynchronously.
        Explicitly pass isAsync=false to call learning path assignment synchronously.
        
     b. 'errorLimit': Pass this parameter to stop further processing, if number of exception encountered by the system is equal to 'errorLimit'.
        'errorLimit' default to 10.
        
  5. Error response has been updated to new format.
  6. Only super admins, organization admins of the organization the learning path belong to,
     and learning path admin of current learning path can call this api.

parameters.name: isAsync
parameters.description: Flag to indicate whether the operation should be done asynchronously or not. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: errorLimit
parameters.description: After encountering 'errorLimit' number of errors. Stop processing.

204.description: Users has been added to Learning path successfully.

400.description: If the user details aren't proper.

403.description: If the user doesn't have access to view groups for learning path.

404.description: If the learningPath Id is not proper.

get.summary: Get hierarchical list of categories and courses for the Learning Path
get.description:
Category data is not localized.

Changes
1. This api will now depend on learning path id.
2. Returned courses will belong to categories which are in same organizations as the
   learning path identified by 'learningPathId'.
3. In case the deployment type is 'IsMultiOrgDeployment' and 'IsGlobalContentEnabled' content is enabled,
   response will also contain courses from common organization categories.
4. Only super admins, organization admins of the organization the selected learning path belongs to,
   and learning path admin of the selected learning path can call this api.

403.description: If the user doesn't have access to view groups for learning path.

404.description: If the learningPath Id is not proper.

get.summary: Gets the blob content from azure storage account.
get.description:
Gets the blob content from azure storage account only for configured extensions

Otherwise, Redirect to blob url with SAS(Shared access signature)

Sample Request URL: /api/v1/manifest/storage/htmllessoncontent/3295/oq3xg/js/local_storage_manager.js

Redirect URl: {ContentEndPoint}/storage/htmllessoncontent/3295/oq3xg/js/local_storage_manager.js?sasToken

put.description:
Request sample format -
```
{
    "department": "engineering",
    "specialization": "back-end engineering",
    "preferred programming language": "c#"
}
```
The keys in the above JSON are the profile field default names

The values are the user specified values

200.description: Successful update of user profile details

400.description: If any of the validation checks fail

get.summary: Get list of users with email address, first name or last name matching the search term.
get.description:
Changes
1. This api now accepts 1 additional query parameters 'orgId'

    a. Pass this parameter to search users in the organization identified by orgId.
     
    b. In case users already exist.They will move to the selected organization.
     
2. Only super admins can get/search users from any organization.
3. Organization admin can get/search users only on those organization where they have admin rights.

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: Identifier of organization in which user needs to be searched.

200.description: Successful retrieval of user search result(s) that matches search term

400.description: If user search term is less than 3

403.description: If user doesn't have required permission

delete.summary: Delete users with the Ids specified in the request body

post.description:
Accepts Multi part form data
- Json array of user contacts. Sample format: ["user_contact", "user_contact", "user_contact"]
- Csv file of users. CSV file should be attached to request with filename as "CsvDoc". Sample format can be downloaded from 'Bulk upload Users' pop up.
Json - List of user view models. Sample format: { "users": [ { "countryCode": "91", "contact": "4321000007", "firstName": "FN-07", "lastName": "LN-07", "customProfilefields": { "Textfield": "1", "Multiselect": "MS01" } }, { "countryCode": "91", "contact": "4321000008", "firstName": "FN-08", "lastName": "LN-08", "customProfilefields": { "Dropdown": "DD01", "Multiselect": "MS01;MS02" } }, { "countryCode": "91", "contact": "4321000009", "firstName": "FN-08", "lastName": "LN-08", "customProfilefields": { "Textfield": "1", "Dropdown": "DD01", "Multiselect": ["MS01","MS02","MS03"] } } ] } Changes 1. This api now accepts 4 additional query parameters 1.1. orgId 1.1.1. Pass this parameter to create users in the organization identified by orgId. 1.1.2. In case users already exist.They will move to the selected organization. 1.2. orgName 1.2.1. Pass this parameter to create users in the organization identified by orgName. 1.2.2. In case users already exist.They will move to the selected organization. 1.3. errorLimit 1.3.1. Pass the parameter to stop further processing if number of exception encountered by the system is equal to errorLimit. errorLimit default to 10 1.4. 'isAsync' 1.4.1. Default value is isAsync is set to true. Which indicates actual user addition and updation will be done asynchronously. Users data validation is done synchronously, actual users creation and updation is done asynchronously. Explicitly pass isAsync=false to call user addition and updation synchronously. 2. In case both orgId and orgName are missing. It is assumed that users are being added to default organization.Organization id = 1. 3. In case both orgId and orgName are passed preference will be given to orgId. 4. Error response has been updated to new format. 5. Only super admins can create/update users in any organization. 6. Organization admin can create/updated users only on those organization where they have admin rights.

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: Optional Parameter: Organization id to which user is being moved.

parameters.name: orgName
parameters.description: Optional Parameter: Organization name to which user is being moved.

parameters.name: isAsync
parameters.description: Optional Parameter: Flag to indicate whether the operation should be done asynchronously or not. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: errorLimit
parameters.description: Optional Parameter: After encountering 'errorLimit' number of errors. Stop processing. Defaults to 10.

400.description: If content type isn't provided.

403.description: The user doesn't have required permissions.

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description:
Authorization by Bearer Token.

To generate Authorization token, please refer below link:

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/industry/training-services/microsoft-community-training/rest-api-management/api-documentation#api-authentication
Value should have prefix Bearer space then access token
Eg: [Bearer \]
